1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message
6  ( module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Message,
7
8    -- * Messages
9    -- ** Terms
10    dupTerm,
11    reqNewTerm,
12    unevenTerms,
13
14    -- ** Others
15    noAttr,
16    notImpl,
17    reqRelmap,
18    notNestRel,
19  ) where
20
21import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Message
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus as K
23
24
25-- ============================================  Messages
26
27-- ---------------------------------  Terms
28
29-- | [Duplicate term names] Duplicate ... in the terms ...
30dupTerm :: (K.GetTermNames t) => t -> K.Ab a
31dupTerm t =
32    K.leftLines "Duplicate term names"
33         $ msgTerms2 "Duplicate" t' "in the terms" t
34        where t' = K.duplicates $ K.getTermNames t
35
36-- | [Require new term names] Present ... in the terms ...
37reqNewTerm :: (K.GetTermNames t) => K.TermPicker c -> t -> K.Ab a
38reqNewTerm pk input =
39    K.leftLines "Require new term names"
40         $ msgTerms2 "Present" (K.preTerms pk) "in the terms" input
41
42-- | [Uneven terms] /N/ and /N/ terms
43unevenTerms :: (K.GetTermNames t1, K.GetTermNames t2) => t1 -> t2 -> K.Ab a
44unevenTerms t1 t2 = K.leftLine "Uneven terms" detail where
45    detail = n1 ++ " and " ++ n2 ++ " terms"
46    n1 = show . length $ K.getTermNames t1
47    n2 = show . length $ K.getTermNames t2
48
49-- ---------------------------------  Others
50
51-- | [Attribute not found]
52noAttr :: String -> K.Ab a
53noAttr n = K.leftLine "Attribute not found" n
54
55-- | [Not implemented]
56notImpl :: K.Ab a
57notImpl = K.leftBecause "Not implemented"
58
59-- | [Require no relmaps]
60--   [Require one relmap]
61--   [Require /N/ relmaps]
62reqRelmap :: Int -> K.Ab a
63reqRelmap 0 = K.leftBecause "Require no relmaps"
64reqRelmap 1 = K.leftBecause "Require one relmap"
65reqRelmap n = K.leftBecause $ "Require " ++ show n ++ " relmaps"
66
67-- | [Not a nested relation]
68notNestRel :: (K.GetTermNames t) => t -> K.Head -> K.Ab a
69notNestRel t he =
70    K.leftLines "Not a nested relation"
71         $ detailTermRel "Given" (K.getTermNames t) he
72
